player
Class AsynchronousPlayer

java.lang.Object
  player.Player
      player.AsynchronousPlayer
Direct Known Subclasses:
ConsolePlayer, HumanPlayer
public class AsynchronousPlayer
extends Player

A player that naturally communicates in an ansynchronous manner, if asked for the next move.

          Buffer for the player's next move.

Method Detail

getNextMove

public Position getNextMove()
Enables the naturally asynchronous communication of this player to be used in a synchronous way. Thus waits for the buffer to be filled and empties the buffer after a request for the next move has been fulfilled.

Specified by:
getNextMove in class Player
Returns:
the next Move of the player.
See Also:
Player.getNextMove()

setNextMove

public void setNextMove(Position nextMove)
Buffers the next move.

Parameters:
nextMove - the next move to buffer.

clean

protected void clean()
Cleans the buffer.
